DOC.brief_summary: In woman undergo labor induction membrane rupture near term , investigate addition foley catheter place cervix standard therapy ( oxytocin administration ) decrease time start induction delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Foley Catheter Labor Induction Women With Term Near Term Membrane Rupture
DOC.detailed_description: To compare efficacy transcervical Foley catheter concurrent oxytocin administration compare oxytocin infusion alone cervical ripen labor induction woman premature rupture membrane ( PROM ) > 34 week .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Preterm rupture membrane ( PROM ) ( Rupture membranes = pooling/ferning/nitrazine + ) Rupture membrane ( ROM ) ≥1 hour prior start induction 2 . Cervix ≤ 2 centimeter ( cm ) 3 . Gestational age ≥ 34 week best obstetric estimate clinical management decision delivery 4 . Singleton gestation 5 . Cephalic 6 . Vertex well apply cervix 1 . Regular uterine contraction ( contraction frequent every 5 minute ) 2 . Two prior transverse uterine incisions/vertical uterine incision/ transmural myomectomy obstetric contraindication labor 3 . Evidence chorioamnionitis ( temperature 100.4°F uterine tenderness maternal fetal tachycardia purulent discharge ) 4 . Lethal fetal anomaly 5 . Intrauterine fetal demise ( IUFD ) 6 . Previa 7 . Suspected abruption/significant hemorrhage 8 . Nonreassuring fetal heart rate ( FHR ) pattern 9 . Non vertex fetal presentation
